subdisciplines.name: Bioethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues arising from advances in biology and medicine.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues arising from our relationship with the natural world.

subdisciplines.name: Feminist Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the role of gender in ethical decision making.

subdisciplines.name: Metaethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the nature of ethical language and thought.

subdisciplines.name: Moral Philosophy
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical theories and ideas.

subdisciplines.name: Social Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues arising from social and political structures and relationships.
